title: Strongest Kim Min-Ja - Novel Updates

description: Kim Mija, a 30-year-old ordinary worker. After getting drunk, she accidentally spent the night together with the Dog Team Leader, who was famous for being crafty. To make the matter worse, her family discovered that they have spent the night together. Facing a lot of crises and to get rid of it, she got married quickly under the strong will of the family. According to Mija, life began to tangle up suddenly, as she was actively wooed by her younger employee Choi Hyun Min. Suspicious-in-law, strange neighbor, and unwanted men’s clothes. Our Mija is struggling to survive the extreme survival love today.>
